reference.title: Adding servers to server groups
reference.shortdesc: Servers are added to server groups with the POST /pools/default/serverGroups/<:uuid>/addNode HTTP method and URI.

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p: POST /pools/default/serverGroups/<:uuid>/addNode adds a server to a cluster and assigns it to the specified server group.

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: curl -X POST -dhostname=192.168.0.2:8091 -d user=myAdmin -d password=myPassword\ -u myAdmin:myPassword \ http://192.168.0.1:8091/pools/default/ \ serverGroups/246b5de857e100dbfd8b6dee0406420a/addNode
